text: The F. E. Bowman Apartments is a historic apartment building located in the Irvington neighborhood of Portland, Oregon, United States. Constructed in 1913, it is one of the oldest apartment buildings in Irvington, and the best preserved from its era. Through its Craftsman styling, builder Frederic E. Bowman gave attention to blending the building into the neighborhood of pre- existing single-family homes. It is one of several apartment buildings of similar scale and/or style that Bowman added to Portland's urban landscape through his career.. The building was placed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1989.. ==See also== *National Register of Historic Places listings in Northeast Portland, Oregon *Irvington Bowman Apartments ==References== ==External links== * * *Oregon Historic Sites Database entry Category:Apartment buildings in Portland, Oregon Category:Residential buildings completed in 1913 Category:1913 establishments in Oregon Category:Neoclassical architecture in Oregon Category:National Register of Historic Places in Portland, Oregon Category:Residential buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Oregon Category:Irvington, Portland, Oregon
title: F. E. Bowman Apartments
